targets.expr: sum(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate * on(namespace) group_left(project, namespaceName) label_replace(projects{projectName="$project"}, "namespace", "$1", "namespaceId", "(.+)") ) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{ resource="cpu"} * on(namespace) group_left(project, namespaceName) label_replace(projects{projectName="$project"}, "namespace", "$1", "namespaceId", "(.+)") )

sum(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate{cluster="$cluster"} * on(namespace) group_left(project, namespaceName) label_replace(projects{projectName="$project"}, "namespace", "$1", "namespaceId", "(.+)") ) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster="$cluster", resource="cpu"} * on(namespace) group_left(project, namespaceName) label_replace(projects{projectName="$project"}, "namespace", "$1", "namespaceId", "(.+)") )

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster="$cluster",container!="", image!=""} * on(namespace) group_left(project, namespaceName) label_replace(projects{projectName="$project"}, "namespace", "$1", "namespaceId", "(.+)") ) 
/
